text: The best <chai> in Madison!! Aimee and Kelly were so inviting. The <chocolate chip banana bread> was delicious and homemade. The <espresso> had a velvety crema with a bright body and smooth finish. The vibe in the place is so inviting and chill. I love it and will definitely travel from Milwaukee again to visit the Froth House!
